scripts.build: npm run build:fe && npm run build:be
scripts.build:fe: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:be && npm run test:fe
scripts.test:be: cd backend && uv run pytest tests -v --tb=short
scripts.test:e2e:deployed: cd frontend && cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 npx playwright test
scripts.lifecycle: npm run build && npm run test && npm run deploy
scripts.lifecycle:full: npm run build && npm run test && npm run deploy && npm run test:e2e:deployed
